# ADR Test Corpus

This directory contains synthetic ADRs for testing export/import functionality.
The ADRs cover various formats and edge cases found in the wild.

## Files

| File | Format | Status | Features |
|------|--------|--------|----------|
| 0001-record-architecture-decisions.md | Nygard | Accepted | Basic ADR |
| 0002-use-postgresql-for-persistence.md | Nygard | Accepted | Supersedes link |
| 0003-use-rust-for-backend.md | Nygard | Proposed | Multi-line consequences |
| 0004-use-madr-format.md | MADR 4.0 | Accepted | YAML frontmatter, decision-makers, consulted, informed |
| 0005-api-versioning-strategy.md | Nygard | Accepted | Amends link |
| 0006-deprecated-xml-api.md | Nygard | Deprecated | Superseded by link |
| 0007-authentication-mechanism.md | MADR 4.0 | Accepted | Multiple links in frontmatter |

## Sources

These ADRs are synthetic but inspired by real-world examples from:
- adr-tools (Nygard format)
- MADR 4.0.0 template
